articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Message from Cambodian King
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Message from Cambodian King
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a message from Norodom Sihamoni, king of Cambodia, on Dec. 8.
					 The king in his message paid high tribute to leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of Dec. 17, 2016, the 5th anniversary of his demise.
					
					 He made a great contribution to the development of the close friendly and cooperative ties between the two peoples, the message said.

articles.title: Message to Kim Jong Un from President of DR Congo
articles.content:
Message to Kim Jong Un from President of DR Congo
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a message from Joseph Kabila Kabange, president of the Democratic Republic of Congo, on December 19.
					 The president in his message expressed the deepest condolences of himself and the people of DR Congo to Kim Jong Un and the Korean people on the occasion of December 17, the unforgettable memorial day of the DPRK.
					
					 Noting that the Korean people have made a steady progress in building a thriving socialist nation under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, displaying the validity and invincibility of their cause, the president reiterated his will to further strengthen the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries.
					
					 The message extended high regards to Kim Jong Un, sincerely wishing him big success in his work for happiness and prosperity of the Korean people.

articles.title: Foreign Ministry Spokesman Blasts U.S.-S. Korea Discussion on "Extended Deterrence Strategy"
articles.content:
Foreign Ministry Spokesman Blasts U.S.-S. Korea Discussion on "Extended Deterrence Strategy"
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Tuesday in connection with the fact that the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces held discussion on "extended deterrence strategy" against the DPRK:
					 There was a meeting of U.S.-south Korea "group for discussion on extended deterrence strategy" in Washington shortly ago.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces agreed to set up the "group" in October and held its first meeting recently. This is a serious provocation aggravating the situation on the Korean peninsula and increasing the danger of a nuclear war there.
					
					 At the recent meeting the U.S. examined the rotation deployment of the U.S. strategic assets in south Korea under the pretext of "threat" from the DPRK. This is an extremely dangerous attempt to put nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK on a regular and institutional basis and stifle it by force.
					
					 By holding closer to it the south Korean puppet forces who are now foundering in the worst ruling crisis, and making them increasingly dependent on it in military field on one hand and by forming the U.S.-Japan-south Korea triangular military alliance and setting up NATO of Asian version on the other hand, the U.S. seeks to contain its rival nations and maintain its military edge in Asia-Pacific and thus realize its hegemonic ambition.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces recently clamored for the building of a nuclear-powered submarine at the instigation of the U.S., a clear revelation of their intention to act a shock brigade and servants in executing the U.S. strategy for invasion and domination of Asia-Pacific.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces are branding the DPRK's bolstering of its nuclear deterrence as "threats" but they can never cover up their criminal nature of threatening the DPRK with nukes and rendering the situation in the region instable through the introduction of huge strategic assets.
					
					 The present situation clearly proves that the DPRK was absolutely just and right when it made the decision and opted for the line to put a definite end to the danger of a nuclear war being imposed by the U.S. and defend peace in the region and the rest of the world in reliance on the powerful nuclear deterrence.  
					
					 We will in the future, too, hold fast to the Workers' Party of Korea's idea and line on simultaneously developing the two fronts and further bolster the nuclear force for self-defence in quality and quantity as long as the U.S. persists in its hostile policy and nuclear threat to the DPRK.

articles.title: Piano Recital of Students of Kim Won Gyun Conservatory Held
articles.content:
Piano Recital of Students of Kim Won Gyun Conservatory Held
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Ministry of Culture and the Russian embassy here co-hosted a piano recital of Han Il Yong and Ma Sin A, students of the Pyongyang Music School No.1 of Kim Won Gyun Conservatory in the run-up to the new year Juche 106 (2017).
					 The recital was held at the Music Hall of the conservatory.
					
					 Among the audience were O Yong Chol, vice-minister of Culture, officials concerned, teachers and students of art and education organs, Russian Ambassador Alexandr Matsegora and his embassy officials, diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies here.
					
					 The recital began with piano solo "We Are the Happiest in the World" and the audience enjoyed various Korean and Russian music pieces.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet
Nampho, December 27 (KCNA) -- Foreign crewmen met at Nampho Port of the DPRK Tuesday to celebrate the 5th anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Nampho City and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Present at the celebration meeting were captains and crewmen of Russian-flagged ship, Vietnamese-flagged ship, Panamanian-flagged ship, Jamaican-flagged ship and Fiji-flagged ship.
					
					 Speakers said that under the guidance of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un the DPRK is demonstrating its might as an invincible politico-ideological and military power.
					
					 They stressed that the signal events and proud successes achieved in the DPRK during the past 5 years are the precious results of his distinguished leadership caliber.
					
					 They expressed hope that Korean people would register bigger successes in building a socialist power and reunifying the country under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A letter to him was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Hails Success of Conference of Chairpersons of Primary Committees of WPK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Hails Success of Conference of Chairpersons of Primary Committees of WPK
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- The First Conference of Chairpersons of the Primary Committees of the Workers' Party of Korea held here was a historic conference which marked a new milestone in strengthening the primary Party organizations so as to steadily consolidate the Party as an indomitable, dynamic and militant one and arousing all service personnel and people to the general offensive for attaining the goal of the building of a powerful socialist country, says Rodong Sinmun in an editorial on Tuesday.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The conference marks an important occasion in defending and adding luster to the feats of the great leaders in consolidating the Party primary committees.
					
					 Very great are the Party's trust and expectation towards the primary committees and their chairpersons.
					
					 The participants of the conference and all other chairpersons should usher in the great heyday of strengthening the whole Party by bringing about a revolutionary turn in the work of the primary committees, fully aware of their important mission and duty of being responsible for the primary committees of the glorious Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Party.
					
					 The respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un is energetically leading the Party to steadily develop in depth the idea of the great leaders of prioritizing the primary committees and to decisively enhance their role as required by the new era of the Juche revolution.
					
					 Well aware of why the Party convened the conference in the significant year when the 7th Congress of the Party was held, its participants and all other chairpersons should devote themselves to the great Party and the great people and to the victory of the sacred revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 They should arm themselves with the spirit of the conference and implement the militant tasks assigned to them by Kim Jong Un, chairman of the WPK, without fail under any circumstances.
					
					 Prioritizing the primary committees is the consistent policy of the Party. The WPK's cause is sure to triumph thanks to its primary committees sharing thought and will with the Party Central Committee and keeping pace with it.

articles.title: Advance of DPRK Can Never Be Blocked: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Advance of DPRK Can Never Be Blocked: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) ? An AP story from Tokyo titled "Changes in north Korea in last five years" was posted on the U.S. online Fox News recently.
					 It analyzed in five aspects the changes that have taken place in the DPRK since Marshal Kim Jong Un emerged as its supreme leader.
					
					 To summarize the story, it said the DPRK has made great achievements in the building of a nuclear power, economic power and a highly civilized nation thanks to the outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Un and the great line of simultaneously pushing forward the two fronts.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The DPRK emerged like a phoenix in the fierce battle between independence and subjugation, between justice and injustice and between the progressive and the reactionary, demonstrating its might as a nuclear power in the East. This appearance is setting right the stubborn twisted conception and way of thinking of the West.
					
					 The last five years spent by the DPRK winning the admiration of the world do not represent a common period, and the hostile forces are getting ever more blatant in their challenges to it as they are displeased to see it growing strong and its people live well off.
					
					 However, the DPRK remains unfazed.
					
					 No matter how desperately the U.S. may get in its political, economic and military threat and blackmail in a bid to bring the DPRK to its knees, the international community regards it as last-ditch efforts of the losers in the face of the strong. It is a daydream to get something through cooperation in pressurizing the DPRK.
					
					 No desperate moves of all hues of hostile forces in the world to attack the great Paektusan nation can block its dynamic advance as it is dashing like the wind along the highway of ever-victorious Songun under the leadership of the peerlessly brilliant commander.
					
					 Only eternal victory awaits the DPRK while inescapable defeat does the U.S. This is the inexorable law governing the standoff between the DPRK and the U.S.

articles.title: No Force Can Overpower Strength of United People: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
No Force Can Overpower Strength of United People: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- The passage of the motion on impeachment of traitor Park Geun Hye through the south Korean puppet "National Assembly" on December 9 was a victory the people of various circles won by staging fierce candlelight actions in unity, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 The reality clearly proved that no sly and ferocious dictator can ever overpower the strength of the united people or arrest their just struggle, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 South Koreans from all walks of life turned out in an all-people resistance to throw overboard Park, the worst political trickster, dictator and bete noire.
					
					 The conservative group of south Korea blustered that "candlelight will die in the wind" but the people clearly demonstrated how strong the might of their candlelight is.
					
					 Taken aback by the strong waves of actions launched by people angry at the "Park Geun Hye-Choe Sun Sil scandal", the traitor worked hard to deceive the public and tide over the ruling crisis in conspiracy with her lackeys.
					
					 But the people remained strong in their will to mete out a stern punishment of history to Park who committed sins only, being most corrupt and incompetent.
					
					 The Park-led group of traitors in the "Saenuri party" who were defying impeachment despite the candlelight actions of the angry public is now finding itself in the bottomless abyss of ruin.
					
					 The south Korean people once again grasped through their struggle the truth that the strength of the united people is inexhaustible and they are sure to win when they struggle in unity for justice and democracy.

articles.title: Minju Joson Blasts Japanese Reactionaries' Discriminative Step against Korean Schools
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blasts Japanese Reactionaries' Discriminative Step against Korean Schools
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Of late the Japanese reactionaries decided to discontinue the payment of subsidies to five Korean schools in Kanagawa Prefecture and the primary and middle school in Wakayama of Japan under absurd pretexts.
					 In this regard, Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a commentary: The above-said measure represents an extreme abuse of power and another human rights abuse as it encroaches on the right of the Korean students to education. It is, at the same time, politically-motivated suppression of children.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Such action is reminiscent of the national assimilation policy enforced by the Japanese imperialists against Koreans in the past.
					
					 In the past they did not allow the Koreans to use their own written and spoken languages and pressurized them to change their surnames into Japanese ones.
					
					 They are going the lengths of threatening to stop the payment of subsidies to the Korean schools under the absurd pretext that the contents of the textbooks of the schools are not to their liking.
					
					 This proves that the Japs' inveterate hostility towards the Korean nation remains unchanged.
					
					 Such action to do harm to the DPRK and Chongryon is nothing but a foolish miscalculation of a street dealer. 
					
					 It will only bring shame, isolation and political ruin to them.

articles.title: Abrogation of "State-Compiled" History Textbooks Urged
articles.content:
Abrogation of "State-Compiled" History Textbooks Urged
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Voice of People, an internet newspaper of south Korea, Monday carried an editorial urging the puppet authorities to accept the people's demand for the abrogation of the "state-compiled history textbook".
					 "State compilation of history textbooks" has been declared as a typical policy of the Park Geun Hye regime but it was far from the demand of the people at that time and even has consistently been rejected by the history and education circles, the editorial noted.
					
					 There is no reason to press for the "state compilation" of history textbooks now that Park Geun Hye's duty as "president" was suspended after the passage of the motion calling for her impeachment at the "National Assembly", it said, adding:
					
					 This issue is still up for discussion despite the suspension of Park's duty because the "prime minister" and the education minister and other guys posted by Park are showing sign of pushing forward it.
					
					 They should be impeached if they insist on the policy, the editorial stressed.

articles.title: Koreans in Russia Observe Demise Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Koreans in Russia Observe Demise Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- A memorial service for leader Kim Jong Il was held by the United Confederation of Koreans in Russia on Dec. 17, the fifth anniversary of his demise.
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Chil Song, chairman of the Confederation, said at the service that Kim Jong Il was a great saint and the sun of the nation who firmly defended the sovereignty of the country and the wellbeing of the people with his outstanding Songun politics when the country was undergoing the biggest difficulties.
					
					 Speakers said that the ideology and undying feats of Kim Jong Il have been invariably carried forward and developed in depth as there is the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Praising highly the undying feats performed by Kim Jong Il for Korea's reunification, they evinced their pledges to take an active part in the movement for national reunification under the uplifted banner of the historic north-south joint declarations.
					
					 The chairman of the Confederation presented a letter to Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the anniversary.
					
					 A memorial service and an art performance were also held by the United Confederation of Koreans in Kyrgyzstan on the same day.
					
					 The United Confederation of Koreans in Uzbekistan also held a memorial service earlier.

articles.title: Int'l Body Introduces Kim Jong Il's Brief History and Work
articles.content:
Int'l Body Introduces Kim Jong Il's Brief History and Work
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association posted on its website the brief history of leader Kim Jong Il and the full text of his work "Socialism Is What Keeps Our People Alive" to commemorate the 5th anniversary of his demise.
					 The work, published on Nov. 14, Juche 81 (1992), tells about the need to defend the global socialist movement and the socialist cause. And it indicates the tasks and ways for adhering to and advancing the socialist cause.
					
					 The Association posted a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il and photos showing his revolutionary activities.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered by Koreans in China
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China and organizations under it held memorial services for leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of his demise.
					 A seminar on the greatness of Kim Jong Il was held at a conference room of the Association in Shenyang, China on Dec. 16.
					
					 Placed on the front wall of the seminar place was a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to Kim Jong Il who devoted his whole life to the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people.
					
					 Choe Un Bok, chairwoman of the Association, said that Kim Jong Il was an outstanding thinker and theoretician, matchless political elder and peerlessly Songun brilliant commander who was possessed of the best qualifications and traits as a great man, and a peerless patriot who made life-long dedication with warm loving care and devotion to the country and people, and kind-hearted father of overseas Koreans.
					
					 She said that Kim Jong Il developed the party, army and state into those of President Kim Il Sung under the uplifted banner of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism, and put the dignity and power of the nation on the highest level. She also said that Kim Jong Il provided two historic north-south summits and advanced the great idea of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 The General Association and all the Koreans in China will strengthen the association, founded and wisely led by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, into an invincible patriotic organization remaining loyal to the ideology and leadership of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un only and thus invariably carry forward and develop the immortal idea on Juche-oriented movement of overseas Koreans and revolutionary feats of the great leaders.
					
					 Speakers praised the noble revolutionary life and undying feats of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They pledged to uphold another great man Kim Jong Un with loyalty, true to the last instructions of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.
					
					 A memorial service of the Zhongnan Regional Association was held at the DPRK Embassy in Beijing on the same day.
					
					 The Liaoning Regional Association, the Jilin Regional Association, branches of Dandong, Harbin and Hailin and other organizations under the General Association placed floral baskets before portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il at the DPRK consulate general in Shenyang and at the Dandong City branch and paid tribute to them on Dec. 16 and 17.
					
					 Then there were a photo exhibition, seminar, study session and remembrance meeting.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Venezuela
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Venezuela
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting took place in Venezuela on Dec. 16 to commemorate the 5th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 On display in the venue of the meeting were photos showing the careers and exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and revolutionary activities of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 There were also photos introducing the reality of the DPRK rapidly developing under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 Present at the meeting were personages and members of the United Left Party, the Motherland Party for All, Military University, the Foreign Ministry, the Sucre Foundation and other units of Venezuela and the DPRK ambassador to this country and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 The general secretary of the Motherland Party for All said that Kim Jong Il formulated the Juche idea founded by Kim Il Sung as the guiding idea of the WPK and set an example for socialist construction.
					
					 He defended the socialist cause through his energetic ideo-theoretical activities and great revolutionary practices and gave victorious confidence to the world revolutionary people struggling for independence and justice, the general secretary added.
					
					 The director general for Asian, Mid-east and Oceanian Affairs of the Foreign Ministry expressed the deepest respects to Kim Jong Il, eternal leader of the Korean people, saying that the proud achievements made in the DPRK are a brilliant fruition of his devoted efforts.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Career, Exploits Lauded by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Career, Exploits Lauded by Foreign Newspapers
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of different countries carried special write-ups, illustrated with a portrait of smiling leader Kim Jong Il, between December 10 and 16 to commemorate the 5th anniversary of his demise.
					 The Lao newspaper Pasason said in an article titled "Legacy Comrade Kim Jong Il handed down to the Korean people":
					
					 Kim Jong Il left as a legacy the great exploits that ensure the eternal foundation and the bright future of socialist Korea.
					
					 Possessed of ideo-theoretical wisdom as his inborn disposition, he glorified the Juche idea, the Songun idea as the eternal guiding idea of Korea and the great guideline in the era of independence.
					
					 He developed the Workers' Party of Korea into an ever-victorious guiding force, the DPRK into an invincible socialist fortress and the Korean People's Army into matchless revolutionary ranks.
					
					 With the politics of love and trust, he cemented the single-minded unity of the Korean society as firm as a rock and ushered in a new era of building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The exploits he performed all his life will shine forever as a noble legacy guaranteeing the accomplishment of the socialist cause in the DPRK and the realization of the cause of global independence.
					
					 The Myanmar newspaper The New Age carried an article titled "The eternal leader of the Korean people" under the headline of "High tribute to HE Kim Jong Il, the great leader of the Korean people, on December 17, 2016, on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of his demise".
					
					 The Congolese newspaper Le Patriot and the Ugandan newspaper Sun Rise, too, carried articles praising Kim Jong Il's revolutionary career.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in DR Congo
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo posted on its internet homepage the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" on Dec. 19 to mark the 25th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 5th anniversary of Kim Jong Un's assumption of KPA supreme commandership. 
					 The work is a speech the Supreme Leader delivered at the military parade held on April 15, Juche 101 (2012) in celebration of the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It clarifies that the century-long history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proved the immutable truth that outstanding leader guarantees the dignity and prosperity of the country and nation.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for glorifying the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully carrying out the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de Presidente del Congo Democratico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de Presidente del Congo Democratico
Pyongyang, 27 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje que le dirigiera el dia 19 el Presidente de la Republica Democratica del Congo, Joseph Kabila Kabange.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					Su Excelencia Presidente.
					
					En ocasion del 17 de diciembre, dia inolvidable de recordacion de vuestro pais, expreso a Ud. y al pueblo coreano las mas profundas condolencias en nombre mio propio y el del pueblo del Congo Democratico.
					
					Bajo su sabia direccion, el pueblo coreano logro incesantes avances en la construccion de la potencia socialista y  manifesto la justeza y la invencibilidad de su causa.
					
					Aprovecho esta oportunidad para reafirmar mi voluntad de ampliar y desarrollar mas las buenas relaciones de amistad y cooperacion, existentes entre nuestros dos paises.
					
					Formulando sinceros votos por mayores exitos en su trabajo para la felicidad y la prosperidad del pueblo coreano, rindo mi alta consideracion a Su Excelencia Presidente.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de rey de Cambodia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de rey de Cambodia
Pyongyang, 27 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje que le dedicara el dia 8 el rey de Cambodia, Norodom Sihamoni.
					La misiva senala como sigue:
					
					Su Excelencia mas querido Presidente
					
					Con motivo del 17 de diciembre de 2016, en que se cumple el aniversario 5 del deceso de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il, gran Dirigente, le rindo el sublime homenaje a este, mas querido gran lider del pueblo coreano.
					
					Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il hizo gran aporte al desarrollo de las estrechas relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los pueblos de nuestros dos paises.
					
					A Su Excelencia Presidente le expreso mi alta consideracion.

articles.title: Portavoz de MINREX de RPDC condena conspiracion peligrosa de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Portavoz de MINREX de RPDC condena conspiracion peligrosa de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 27 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En exclusiva con la ACNC concedida el dia 27 con motivo de que EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos discutieron la "estrategia de disuasivo ampliado" contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio la siguiente respuesta:
					Recientemente, tuvo lugar en Washington una reunion del "grupo para discutir la estrategia de disuasivo ampliado" EE.UU.- el Sur de Corea.
					
					En octubre pasado, las ambas partes acordaron organizar el citado "grupo" y esta vez, convocaron su primera sesion, lo cual deviene una grave provocacion que exacerba mas la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y agranda el peligro de la guerra nuclear.
					
					En la ocasion, el pais norteamericano examino la ubicacion circular de sus propiedades estrategicas en el Sur de Corea bajo el pretexto la "amenaza" de la RPDC, demostrando su intento muy peligroso destinado a regularizar y normalizar la amenaza y chantaje nucleares anti-RPDC, que vinieron perpetrandose ya antes, y presionar militarmente a esta.
					
					A fin de realizar su ambicion hegemonica, el imperio norteamericano intenta subyugar mas militarmente a los titeres surcoreanos que cayeron en la mas peor crisis politica, por una parte y por la otra, organizar la alianza militar tripartita EE.UU.- Japon - el Sur de Corea y fabricar la "OTAN" de version asiatica para mantener a raya a los Estados rivales y tomar la supremacia militar en la region Asia-Pacifico.
					
					En los ultimos dias, los titeres surcoreanos proclamaron la construccion del submarino nuclear bajo la instigacion de su amo gringo, exponiendo su verdadera intencion de desempenar el papel de la brigada de choque en el cumplimiento de la estrategia agresiva de EE.UU. de dominar la region Asia-Pacifico.
					
					Aunque EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos acusan el fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC como la "amenaza", no pueden ocultar su naturaleza criminal que amenaza con armas nucleares a la RPDC y fomenta la inestabilidad de la situacion, introduciendo las propiedades estrategicas.
					
					La situacion actual muestra claramente cuan justas y correctas son la decision y la linea de la RPDC para poner fin con el poderoso disuasivo nuclear al peligro de guerra nuclear impuesto por EE.UU. y defender la paz y seguridad de la region y el resto del mundo.
					
					En el futuro tambien, la RPDC mantendra invariablemente la idea y la linea del Partido del Trabajo de Corea sobre el desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de las fuerzas armadas nucleares, para consolidar cualitativa y cuantitativamente las fuerzas armadas nucleares de caracter autodefensivo, mientras existan la politica hostil y la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena medida discriminante de reaccionarios japoneses
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena medida discriminante de reaccionarios japoneses
Pyongyang, 27 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Hace poco, los reaccionarios japoneses decidieron bajo el pretexto injusto la suspension de egreso de los subsidios para las 5 escuelas coreanas en el departamento de Kanagawa y la escuela primaria y secundaria coreana de Wakayama.
					Esta medida discriminante de los reaccionarios japoneses sobre las escuelas coreanas deviene el extremo abuso de autoridad, otro crimen de violacion a los derechos humanos que pisotea el derecho a estudio de los alumnos coreanos y la represion politica contra los ninos. 
					
					Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson, en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 27 y continua:
					
					Este acto malvado de los reaccionarios japoneses hace recordar la politica asimilista nacional, perpetrada en el pasado por el imperialismo japones contra los coreanos.
					
					Pues, los imperialistas japoneses no permitieron a los coreanos el uso de la lengua y palabra nacionales e incluso, le obligaron cambiar su apellido con el japones.
					
					En la actualidad tambien, bajo el absurdo pretexto de que no les gusta el contenido de manual de las escuelas coreanas los reaccionarios japoneses no quieren desembolsarles a estas los gastos educacionales.
					
					Esto muestra que nunca se cambia la naturaleza maligna y cruel de los japoneses que tiene enemistad a la nacion coreana.
					
					No valdra nada el calculo de los reaccionarios japoneses para doblegar con gastos educacionales a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon.
					
					Cuanto mas los reaccionarios japoneses recurran al metodo puerco persiguiendo la politica de hostilidad anti-RPDC, tanto mas sufriran solo la verguenza y aislamiento internacionales  y su derrota politica.
